sentences.en: ...a large glass jar filled with pennies, nickels, dimes, and quarters.
sentences.cn: …一个装满1分、5分、10分和25分硬币的大玻璃罐。

sentences.en: Chain stores won't let John D . Rockefeller charged a nickel.
sentences.cn: 大联号商店都不会让约翰? 洛克菲勒挂一分钱帐的.

sentences.en: Commercially two main types of hydrogenations are carried out with Nickel catalyst.
sentences.cn: 商业上采用的以镍作催化剂的氢化有两种.

sentences.en: He immediately used the same nickel to buy one of Billy's cakes.
sentences.cn: 他立即用同样的五美分币买了比利的一块蛋糕.

sentences.en: I had to make some nickel - and - dime repairs on my old Chevy.
sentences.cn: 我那辆雪佛兰老爷车需要不少零零星星的修理.

sentences.en: In the squares place a penny, nickel, dime and quarter in that order. The object is to reverse the order of these coins.
sentences.cn: 在这些方块中按顺序放置1分、5分、10分和25分的硬币各一枚。目标是颠倒这些硬币的顺序。

sentences.en: Iron, nickel, copper, silver, gold, iridium , or ruthenium may be included as cocatalyst metals.
sentences.cn: 铁 、 镍 、 铜, 银 、 金, 铱或钌,可用作复合催化剂金属.

sentences.en: Many sulphides, selenides, and tellurides have the nickel arsenide's NiAs type of structure.
sentences.cn: 许多硫化物, 硒化物和碲化物具有砷化镍NiAs型的结构.

sentences.en: Metals commonly mixed with gold are nickel, platinum, and copper.
sentences.cn: 通常与金混合的金属有镍 、 铂和铜.

sentences.en: Nickel can be used for making coins.
The earth's core, at least the outer one is believed to consist of nickel and iron.
sentences.cn: 一般认为地核至少是外核由镍和铁构成.

sentences.en: The following elements are nickel, chromium, molybdenum.
sentences.cn: 这些元素是:镍 、 铬 、 钼.

sentences.en: This is essentially a development of thoria dispersion strengthened nickel alloys.
sentences.cn: 这基本上是用二氧化钍弥散强度化的镍基合金.

sentences.en: Weekly repairs on my old Chevy were nickel - and - diming me to death.
sentences.cn: 每个星期修我那部雪佛兰老爷车一点一滴地把我榨穷了.

trans.tran_en: a hard silver-white metal that is often combined with other metals, for example to make steel. It is a chemical element: symbol Ni
